author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:

This PR completely removes all duplicate pixels from the clustering step. This is an alternative to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37496 where charges from duplicate pixels are summed up.

No changes are expected in MC samples. In the data there could be some tiny differences in case some duplicate pixels appear.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles :)
title: Remove duplicate pixels
